*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Samuel M. Williams, Victoria, May 23, 1832. Instructing him to locate certain grants including the present city of Austin,*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Victoria */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="05-23-1832">23 May 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr Sir.*/p*
*p*I wrote you *date_mentioned n="05-22-1832">yesterday */date_mentioned*by mail, since then *person_mentioned*Mr Greaves*/person_mentioned* has concluded to go on direct to *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, and not follow *person_mentioned*Mason */person_mentioned*and self in the vuelta by *location_mentioned*Tampico */location_mentioned*through heat and war. you will find him a very usefull man, much more so than any I have ever seen in *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*for an office where Spanish and english is needed. You must make good use of the time between this and *date_mentioned n="01-xx-1833">Jany */date_mentioned*to bring up all the back writing of the *location_mentioned*office*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*I sent you from *location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned*by mail, all the necessary papers to finish the titles for the *location_mentioned*lands */location_mentioned*granted to the *person_mentioned*Aguirres */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Vega*/person_mentioned* with directions as to locating it—on reflection I think I shall return *location_mentioned*home */location_mentioned*from *location_mentioned*Matamoros*/location_mentioned*—that is if I am not detained too long in getting there, and in that event I will attend to their location myself—but I wish you to employ a *person_mentioned*person of confidence*/person_mentioned* to explore the land *location_mentioned*up the San Jacinto, west side,*/location_mentioned* and see if one of the *location_mentioned*grants*/location_mentioned* can not be located there entire to advantage, have this done without delay so that I may know when I get there whether to take it or not. I wish the location on *location_mentioned*Onion Creek west side of Colorado,*/location_mentioned* and on the *location_mentioned*east side at the foot of the mountains*/location_mentioned*, also the *location_mentioned*cedar league N° 4 above Bastrop*/location_mentioned*—. Enfin this land will cost me very dear and unless it is well located I shall loose on it.*/p*
*p*You will see by the new colonization law that all sales heretofore made must be located within 18 months—this will cause a great push, and unless some care is taken all the land in our *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*will be occupied by them—keep this in view—also remember that I have very advantageous offers to settle that *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*which I shall decide upon after seeing the *person_mentioned*General*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*Above all things keep peace and harmony in the *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*. We have all sorts of reports here about *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, and it is said that three *person_mentioned*soldiers */person_mentioned*were killed at *location_mentioned*Anahuac */location_mentioned*by the crew of a vessell. I hope this is not so—do keep peace in that *location_mentioned*quarter*/location_mentioned*—urge this on the *person_mentioned*Ayto */person_mentioned*and on *person_mentioned*every one*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Remember me to *person_mentioned*Sarah */person_mentioned*and all others.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
